title: 542: The 2022 Dionysus Awards
itunes:author: Philosophy Talk Starters
itunes:summary:
More at https://www.philosophytalk.org/shows/2022-dionysus-awards.

What movies of the past year challenged our assumptions and made us think about things in new ways? Josh and guest co-host Jeremy Sabol present our annual Dionysus Awards for the most thought-provoking films of 2021, including:

• Best Attempt to Redeem 80+ Years of Questionable Ethics
• Best Film about Complicated Mothers Telling Uncomfortable Truths
• Best Adapted Novel about Trauma, Marginalization, Self-Deception AND the Gap Between Appearance and Reality
itunes:subtitle: More at https://www.philosophytalk.org/shows/2022…
